sentences.en: His secretary acts as a gatekeeper, reading all mail before it reaches her boss.
sentences.cn: 老板的秘书负责把关，所有邮件都由她先过目再呈送给他。

sentences.en: The gatekeeper says that he cannot grant him entry at the moment.
sentences.cn: 看门人说他现在不能让他进去。

sentences.en: Her job was to serve as a gatekeeper, a human shield for the technicians.
sentences.cn: 她的工作是当一个看门人——技术员的人盾。
